column1: Daisy Gamgee ( - ?) was the oldest daughter of Gaffer Gamgee and Bell Gamgee. She had two older brothers
column3: and Halfred Gamgee as well as three younger siblings: May Gamgee
derives from Old English dæges eage "days eye".Jim Allan (ed.)

column1: The Sindarin version of the name was Eirien.
